img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a player character is engaged in combat with a large, menacing creature resembling a werewolf. The creature has glowing red eyes and is in mid-attack, leaping towards the character who is wielding a sword. The environment appears to be a misty, forested area with a building in the background. The user interface displays health bars and various icons, indicating gameplay elements such as health status and abilities. The name "Lingguzi" is shown on the screen, likely referring to the creature or the current objective.
